title: Approach to sculpture
brief_description: The basis of sculptural expression, examples of different forms, and the work of Clement Meadmore. The use of lines, planes and shapes is demonstrated with models and exemplified in the work of modern and classic sculptors. The basic qualities of sculpture. Clement Meadmore working from a model to a full-scale finished sculpture in welded steel.
